reviews.review: Es un juego maravilloso, cuando crees que todo se ha terminado en la campaña 1 jugador él mismo juego te sorprende con el modo coop. Ademas es un juego que le da mucho protagonismo al antagonista, por no decir todo
it's fun and hard at the same time have some fun make maps and more

Fazla uzatmaya gerek yok. Bana kalırsa sadece valve şirketinin değil, tüm oyun şirketlerinin yaptığı oyunlar arasında en iyi oyunlardan birisi ve hatta bence en iyisi. devamı gelsin istediğim ama devamı gelince oyunun tadının bozulmasından korktuğum için pek de devamı gelmesin istediğim oyundur. oynanışı ile bilgileri vermedim çünkü eminim bir çok incelemede bununla ilgili bilgi vardır. Benim eklemek istediğim sadece oyunun kendisi değil oyunun steam üzerindeki modları da çok güzel. oyun bitince onları da denemenizi mutlaka öneririm.

If your looking for a good puzzle game 
with a story and a co-op mod this is the game.
Pretty good game, can recommend it.
This is totally amazing. I had an awesome experience which I'll never forget for sure!
Maravilloso juego de puzzles que marco un antes y un después en la historia de los videojuegos, altamente recomendado.
Killed partner in co-op. Was fun.
Un juego brillante, difícil y complejo que te enseñará a pensar fuera de la caja.

Honestly, this is one of the best puzzle games you'll get. it's worth way more than what it's priced at. The single-player story is engaging with puzzles that are fun to solve, except for a few fustrating ones...
The co-op mode is best enjoyed with a friend in discord, and takes about as long as the single player mode, if not longer. Also, have fun messing with each other and killing each other!
Completed everything in the game? try the community test chambers! many of these will put everything you've learned to the test in extreme ways, and others are easy, but not too easy, so you feel like 500 IQ, which is needed to keepplayingendrantplease
Point is, its a puzzle game, fun, friends and community make it better.
Don't forget there are community co-op test chambers somewhere.
Прикольная игра по прохождению + как доп., мультиплеер и карты из сообщества))
Nice gameplay, but too few ways to kill teammate in co-op.

Я вам серьезно говорю, возможно, вы никогда не были в курсе. В этом случае я хочу посоветовать Вам, как ни в чем не бывало выразить эти неприятные, возможно слегка унылые колебания. Где как ни здесь есть возможность просто-напросто что-то вытащить из так-называемых пустых посланий? Конечно. Нигде

This sequel to Portal is brilliant. Portal 2 is funny and dark at the same time. Wheatly is a funny character who really isn't sure about anything. The part when he takes over Aperture was a big surprise. The chamber creator is simple to use, but very experimental; the sort of thing where you place something, run it then tweak it. GLaDOS is much darker and evil than she was in the first game, and the fact that she changes sides when Wheatly takes over really says what kind of a person GLaDOS is. My final word, I love it!
bought it for $1 and was surprised by how good it is, even in 2019. Must buy!
i did this for the steam sale tbh
